data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Signing of MOU with the Government of India regarding Production Linked Incentive

data.caption: Agreements
data.news_body: Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Joint Venture Agreement executed with VABO Composites, B.V (Netherlands).

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about receipt of approval of Listing of equity shares of Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited  on Capital Market Segment (Main Board) pursuant to Migration from SME Emerge platform (NSE)

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Krishna Defence And Allied Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015
